welcome_message: Welcome to the default SQL template for Databricks Asset Bundles!

project_name.description:
Please provide the following details to tailor the template to your preferences.

Unique name for this project
project_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Name must consist of letters, numbers, and underscores.

http_path.pattern_match_failure_message: Path must be of the form /sql/1.0/warehouses/abcdef1234567890
http_path.description: SQL warehouse path to use (find this path by clicking on "Connection Details" on a SQL warehouse
